entry.title: The Tears We Cry
entry.summary:
Author: Oli_Umbra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,687Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: Stiles nodded, unable to speak, a knot of dread tightening in his stomach. He could feel Szymon's breath on his skin, warm and damp. "Good," Szymon whispered. "That's a good boy." He squeezed Stiles' shoulder, a pressure that was both reassuring and threatening. Then he stood up, the mattress springing back. "Get some sleep." He walked to the door, pausing to look back. "Remember, Stiles. I'm here for you. For anything." The door clicked shut, and Stiles was alone in the moonlight again. But the peace was gone, replaced by a cold dread that settled deep in his bones. He didn't move for a long time, just stared at the door, listening to the silence. He knew, with a certainty that chilled him to the core, that things had just gotten much, much worse.

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,244Chapters: 12/21Kudos: 185

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: (I loved) everything about you that hurt
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,291Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: “We don’t have to talk about it.”Derek gives him a withering look. “Really? We’re—doing this and you don’t think we should talk about it?”“We were kids,” Stiles dismisses.“I was horrible,” Derek practically snarls, face twisted up in disgust. “I was—” He seems to flounder for a second while he finds the right word. “—struggling, and I used you—”“I let you,” Stiles assures him. “I wanted you to use me. Trust me, I don’t regret it.”“You probably should,” Derek says. “You should regret it and you should hate me for it.”“Lots of people have way more traumatizing first boyfriends,” Stiles says. “And it was over ten years ago—it’s a memory. It doesn’t haunt me or anything. I actually—I have good feelings about most of my memories of you.” And the bad feelings are guilt and regret that he didn’t do more to help Derek. So hatred isn’t really on the list.-0-Derek and Stiles were child stars. They run into each other thirteen years later.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,202Chapters: 30/35Kudos: 128

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: My Dogtor Thinks I'm Dying
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,870Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 268

Summary: Stiles doesn’t think there’s anything wrong with him, except maybe chronic over-caffeination. But his dad’s retired K-9, Bandit, disagrees. According to TikTok, that means cancer. Or seizures. Or secret pregnancy. Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. It’s fine. Totally fine. Not a meet-cute. Definitely not.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,921Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 45

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,189Chapters: 8/23Kudos: 61

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.
